name: Circle of the Land
description: Druids of the Circle of the Land are mystics and sages who draw magical power from a specific type of terrain, gaining expanded spellcasting tied to their chosen land.

2.name: Circle Spells
2.description: You gain additional spells based on the land you choose, and these spells are always prepared.

2.name: Natural Recovery
2.description: During a short rest, you can recover expended spell slots with a combined level equal to half your druid level.

6.name: Land’s Stride
6.description: Moving through nonmagical difficult terrain costs you no extra movement, and you have advantage against plants that impede movement.

10.name: Nature’s Ward
10.description: You are immune to poison and disease, and you can’t be charmed or frightened by elementals or fey.

14.name: Nature’s Sanctuary
14.description: Beasts and plants must succeed on a saving throw to attack you.
